author: Rob Blevins
comment: Initially I had some difficulty getting the app to work, but contacted Critter and they got back to me very quickly and solved my problem.  Turns out it was just something I needed to do on my end.    I think the face has a lot of potential.  It's good looking and functional.  I look forward to seeing if any additional features or customization are added, but it is very good for a new face.  Having used BCN for a long time now, and knowing how great of an app it is, I definitely recommend the face!

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: In what way does it not work? It should work. We don't control how fast it synchs through Android Wear. PLease go to settings on Android Wear and choose Sync All Apps for the watch.

author: Andrew Stevens
comment: Quality of the UI artwork is disappointing.
title: Works but low resolution UI
